page.title: 13BALLYCLARE VICTORIA BAND
page.content: Ballyclare Victoria{Flute Band}are the world champions ten times over. Their {band }room is situated in the market yard. Their street{uniform}is as follows : navy jackets with gold braid,black ties , white shirts,navy trousers and black socks and shoes. Their dress {uniform }is,a royal blue dress jacket with the Ballyclare coat of arms on the pocket,a light blue frilly shirt,navy dickey-bow and black trousers. There are different groups of {Flutes }in a {band. } Some other instruments are drums and cymbols. Another very important part of the {band}is the{conductor. Every year the {band }has a dinner dance . This dance is held in a hotel like the Highways. At the dance each member of the{band}receives a medal. {}
